modName: League of Legends Ahri Voice Pack Korean Version
summary:
Changes your character's voice to Ahri's
PC only voice, does not change NPCs' voices
Very Hentai...
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131023175855/leagueoflegends/images/8/86/League_of_legends_logo_transparent.png[/img]

[b]-Thank you Riot Games for giving me the permission to port and upload the voice files-[/b][/center]

[img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C3lL4S_AohI/UrDEsG41w3I/AAAAAAAACKM/tMoMG4iQtNw/s320/Description.png[/img]
This mod changes your character's voice to Ahri's from League of Legends without changing NPCs voice, so you don't have to worry about ugly bandit ladies sound like a teenager. Warning though, this is not recommended if you don't have headphones, since it may sound like as if you are watching porn/hentai. Her dialogue is not included.


[img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lUOcDQxs8g0/UrDEkxaX_zI/AAAAAAAACJk/qg-ersaFQyM/s1600/Note.png[/img]
I'm willing to take requests for other voice mods as well. However the process is very time-taking and can be annoying so I can only create one voice mod per month. Also I actually don't know how to port files from clients, so you guys are going to have to provide me the files.


[img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A380Qp5HuaM/UrDEk8obtBI/AAAAAAAACJo/qj_vjaf6HZk/s1600/Videos.png[/img]

[b]The Original Voice[/b]
[youtube]TSqB7Qimm-0[/youtube]

[b]In-game Footage (sorry the video is kinda old)[/b]
[youtube]ytiRpLzsS9s[/youtube]



[img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-efLvBmx6vLY/UrDEqQCpiFI/AAAAAAAACKA/-4JkmuDmMmQ/s320/permission.png[/img]
You may not upload the file on any other websites under any circumstances. Ask me for permission if you want to use my mod for your own mod.



[img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rTyWU66Yhko/UrDEpC7x6oI/AAAAAAAACJ4/3WPR7QMHd68/s1600/coollogo_com-17652975.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23512/?]Ly Player Only Voice Replacer by lylion12[/url]
[url=http://www.riotgames.com/]Riot Games[/url]
author: choco2114
